title: all the walls, containing the openings for light and ventilation fully exposed to an exterior open space either directly or through a balcony not exceeding 2m
clause_text: all the walls, containing the openings for light and ventilation fully exposed to an exterior open space either directly or through a balcony not exceeding 2m. in width provided that a room meant for non- residential user shall be considered as adequately lighted and ventilated if its depth from the side abutting the required open space does not exceed 12 m and in case centrally air-conditioned building may be allowed to be exceeded up to 20 m.
